LanguageData.AnomalyRemixGrayPall_AnomalyThreatsInact: Adjust the percentage of major threats that will be Anomaly-related when there is no gray pall active. Only certain minor Anomaly incidents can occur when no gray pall is active.
LanguageData.AnomalyRemixGrayPall_AnomalyThreatsActiv: Adjust the percentage of major threats that will be Anomaly-related when a gray pall is active.
LanguageData.AnomalyRemixGrayPall_GrayPallMtbDays_Inf: Adjust the average number of days between gray pall events.
LanguageData.AnomalyRemixGrayPall_GrayPallExtraThreat: Adjust the average number of hours between extra Anomaly threats during gray pall events.
